attributes.action: National Service for all 16-18 year-olds, including ALL immigrants wishing to enter this country
attributes.additional_details: I want the Government to impose compulsory National Service on all 16-18 year-olds, reducing unemployment, teaching discipline and restoring pride. Also, anybody wishing to enter this country to claim our benefits should be required to serve Queen and Country. If after National Service they wish to join up and serve this country in active service, keep them on and pay them more. They will have been trained, and it will be money well spent.
